author: Eric Smith
comment: Pretty good except for one very irritating thing. When adding items to this by voice, it insists on using some predefined database list or something. If I say chamomile vanilla tea, it adds vanilla and cuts off the other words. No matter how many times I try it insists on cutting off extra descriptive words very irritating. It should just transcribe what I say and not try to match what I say to some predefined grocery list. Update: I have to drop it to 2 stars because this thing about only adding words that is on a predefined list is just too irritating. I am actively looking for an alternative.

author: Luke Jackson
comment: This app is awesome. No more forgetting the grocery list, and you can add or delete items easily when sharing the list.

author: Mellysa Newell
comment: The absolute best list app I've used. I love that it saves your crossed off items so you can quickly add them back to your list with just a tap.

author: Eric Karlsen
comment: This app became a part of my life! Sharing lists with others is just great!

author: Ryan Emmett
comment: Simple to use, yet powerful. It syncs quickly across devices, so all my lists stay up to date. I don't know how I managed shopping without it!

author: Brenda Holt
comment: I like this app because it gives you your grocery list to be with you at all times and you can send it to your husband if he's out and about great app

author: Guy Simons
comment: Great app, not as flashy as others, but works every time and syncs with my wife's phone perfectly. Thank you.

author: Matthew Lenz
comment: So many areas of improvement needed.  Almost no real improvement over the years. Looks like an Android 101 project + material design.

author: Paul O
comment: Yet another Wearable app with only dictation input. Keyboard input is a must have option. Don't get why the developers can't implement this simple feature. Oh well, this was fourth, on to the fifth...

author: Mrs Al
comment: Easy  to use.  Needs menu list for recipes.

author: Dale Mack
comment: Handy app for shoppers

author: Paul Birnstihl
comment: Works perfectly.

author: Tamara Johnson
comment: I've used this app for a long time. There are several great features available, the one I enjoy the most is the ability to share my grocery list with my husband. Either one of us can go into the store and get everything needed without making one phone call - it's always on the list! Will continue to use for years to come!

author: M Vath
comment: This app is fantastic! I use it daily. Real-time, interchangeable with Android and IPhones, I have a Droid and my husband an IPhone we can use the app together. I can tell Alexa to put something on my grocery list while my husband is at the store and he sees what I put on the list.   Also if we go shopping together we can split up  with the kids and take one half of the store. We can see what each other has gotten or not gotten. I like the photo feature in the paid version.  I can take a pic of what I need and he knows exactly what to get.  Only two apps I live by,  this, Our Groceries and ScreenTime for my kids!!  One keeps track of my groceries and other keeps track of my kids 😉

I love this app. There are only a couple  things I would like to see changed is the option for sub categories added, my husband and I like to use only one shopping list and we shop at multiple stores. Being able to locate items at the different stores faster would be great because every store arranges their store differently (by aisle # or section, ie. housewares or electronics) Also I agree with others about deleting items off the list being too easy especially with the widget. Maybe a swiping motion would be better.

I love this app.  Does just about everything I want a shopping app to do. The only suggestion I have is to make every shopping list capable of being sorted into their own aisles and categories.  Is there a way I can shop at 2 different supermarkets and be able to have separate aisles for each of them?  They don't have the same shelf layouts, so currently one of my lists has to have all items uncategorised as categories for the other supermarket are different.

author: Susan Hopkins
comment: I haven't tried any other shopping list programs so I can't compare. However, this program has been very easy to use. And helpful while shopping. The only thing I would like to add would be to enter prices and have it keep track of how much I'm spending add in the tax so I can know ahead of time what the total will be. It would also be nice that once the cost were entered it could give you an estimate of your next shopping trip as you add items to your list. Thanks for this program!

author: Tom Loveday
comment: Great app, except it keys off the email address you had when you install it. Also, I paid for the plus version but that went away on the first phone change. When I lost access to my email account, now I have to contact support when I get a new phone. A simple fix would make it a top notch app.

author: jean zajkowski
comment: I'm not a tech person at all. My husband talked me into using this app... and I'm glad he did. Very user friendly. Our boys put it on their phone, so now any one of us adds items to the list. I like that I can make individual lists for multiple stores.

author: Nic Hilgendorf
comment: Came from another grocery app after using for years.   This has almost everything that I was looking for in a tidy list format. Easy to use, customizable categories, web site support for managing and adding. Never an issue with syncing like I was having with the other app. I like being able to add stuff by voice, and it has an option to stay in the add field which makes it super easy to add a bunch of stuff quickly.   You can add entire recipes, but I've never found that useful. Also the info icon for editing the item is fine, but clunky. Once you add an item, in order to adjust quantities you have to go to the list, find the item, press the I icon, increase the quantity and save. I'd like a simple swipe to the right or left on a list item to change quantities.   Ended up paying for the pro version just because I really appreciate this app, and it's the best one I've used. This removes adds and gives you access to scan barcodes. Helpful for really specific items.  Overall, great app and highly recommended. As with anything, there's room for improvement.

author: Denis Shelston
comment: Would earn a 5 star rating. Please, please change the Delete item to a full swipe. At the store I often touch items inadvertently and it goes away without me noticing... I get home and notice forgot a few items.

author: Ashley Thoren
comment: Have really enjoyed this one so far. Integrates with Google Assistant although the voice recognition could use improvements. Also wish I could record prices and stores when I buy things to see trends on my habits!

author: Katie Doyle
comment: Me and my live in boyfriend LOVE this! We both have busy schedules so we can never go shopping together, having the 1 list that we both see and can add to is awesome! 🖒❤

author: lukesahm
comment: I love this app!  It makes it wonderful to send to someone else so they can shop.  My only complaint is that there is not a notification to the receiver.  If there was that capability, I would be giving it 5 stars.
Love that I can have separate lists for stores and can add to the lists using Alexa voice. Would like an abbreviated method for saying 'Alexa, ask our groceries to add xx to Wal-Mart shopping list'.

Worked great when both devices are on the same WiFi.  But if you're not on the same WiFi (you know on the off chance someone might want to use this app while at the store??), they do not synchronize.  New items disappear..old items reappear.    I'm sick of having to go back out to buy things.  And does anyone need extra birthday cards for a niece?  I HAVE EXTRAS!!!  Entirely useless.  Switching to using Google Keep.

reply.author: HeadCode
reply.content: Sorry that happened! We try to synchronize at all times, and being on the same Wi-Fi is not a factor. (The synchronization goes through our server, not directly phone-to-phone.) The phone must have had a hard time accessing our server while at the store. We plan to add a warning when we detect this.

author: George D
comment: Another update. 2/3/18 Sharing lists is a nice feature. I also use the deleted items list to remember what I regularly buy. Tap a deleted item, and it undeletes it and adds it to the list. Another update 7/4/17: Still awesome! New Update: I still use it all the time.  Update: I use it all the time.   Old review: It's the grocery list app I always use. I' wish they'd add a little more jump capability and  they'd make sorting a one press option on every page.  It's fine as it is, I'm just nitpicking.
We have a large family. Everyone has this app and it makes grocery shopping easier. There's one list and we make fewer trips to the store because we forgot something.  Love it!

author: Sylvie Trudel
comment: Hated it the first time around but giving it another try!! First much needed improvement to be done would be to be able to "delete crossed off items", instead of list!! Add the possibility to add prices and by weight (metric and imperial), format etc, and taxes!

author: Ilsa Plaisance
comment: Makes running my household so much easier.  I am always sharing it with friends.  I just don't have enough good things to say about this app.

author: John Pope
comment: This is a grocery list(s) that you can share with other people.  Both, my wife and I, can add things or remove things from various lists.  We have one list for food and another for her favorite discount store and one for the home improvement store I like.  I can scan food onto the list via barcode.  I used the last of the ham making a sandwich?  I just scan the bar code before tossing the trash and voila, it's on the list.  My wife can also put things on a "get on your way home" list for me to grab on my way home for work.  Aside from that one con, it's a great app. (Kidding about the con there.  I like to eat, too.)

author: Chris
comment: I really can't see how this app has 4.6 stars, must be fake reviews. Lacking basic functionality, like adding an item and increasing the quantity right there. Nope, you have to reopen the item, then adjust the quantity. If you want to categorize an item your entering in, if the category hasn't already been created, you have to save the item as uncategorized, then create the category, and now go back to the item.to add it to the new category.

author: Rashelle Shatzer
comment: I love that this app can be shared with someone and can create recipes on it. Only set back is putting all the recipes into app and no option for multiple amounts of some item.

author: Darhar M.
comment: Been using this app about a week and it is a breeze to use.  Initial setup takes a little bit of time creating categories I use but after that I was good to go.   Have not played with the bar-code scanning feature yet but everything is pretty self-explanatory so I foresee no problems even for those that are new to using apps.

author: Brenda Secre
comment: I am in a wheelchair and can't get out much so my children get my shopping done for me. The ability to share my list is amazing

author: Anke S
comment: Great app, using it since years with no problems. Suggestion for improvement: would like to be able to compare prices of products between shops, so a section for cost per item would be great, or at least the possibility to add notes to items. Thank you for this app, well worth the fee...

author: Rob Wilson
comment: My family has tried a few list apps and this one has worked out the best. It's easy to use from multiple devices and easy to shop from if you use categories.

author: David Schott
comment: Great simple list app that shares with the wife very well. However, the barcode scanner aspect doesn't work very well. Typically get product not found after scanning.

author: Kamila Ema
comment: This app is awesome! Great for sharing a grocery list as a couple. The best part is being able to shop separately but seeing the items crossed off in real time. Love the recipes feature

author: Cathryn Spreeman
comment: Love it. No list on paper, easily organize items by dairy, deli, bakery, etc or by aisle if you wish.
